name: Dr. Emily Parker
bio: Dr. Parker specializes in pet skin and coat care, ensuring your furry friends stay comfortable and healthy during dry winter months.

name: Dr. Liam Chen
bio: Dr. Chen focuses on balanced diets and customized nutrition plans for pets to maintain energy and immunity during the winter season.

name: Dr. Sophia Martinez
bio: Dr. Martinez is known for her compassionate approach and expertise in emergency winter care.

name: Dr. Noah Rahman
bio: Dr. Rahman helps pet owners manage behavior changes in pets during the cold season, ensuring emotional and physical well-being.
